entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
